newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philex 1996 net at 1.4 bln pesos - report.
newsitem.headline: Philex 1996 net at 1.4 bln pesos - report.

text.p: Philex Mining Corp made a group net income of 1.4 billion pesos in 1996, up from 369 million pesos in 1995, newspapers reported on Tuesday.
The reports said Philex made extraordinary profits from the sale of its shares in CityTrust Banking Corp.
It also made a gain of 900 million pesos from the initial public offering of its Canadian gold unit, Philex Gold Inc.

The reports also said Philex booked equity income from the commercial operations of its Bulawan gold mine under its subsidiary Philex Gold. The Bulawan mine, located in Negros Occidental, central Philippines, produced 90,083 ounces of gold at a cash cost of $199 per ounce in 1996, the newspapers said.
